input.sentences: on our day of the protest | many people showed up .
it was great to see people fight even with enforcement there .
many people made signs in the protest .
it was great to see all of the creativity from the protesters .
we we marched out but we did not go out in silence .
output.sentences: Earlier in the day, I saw a bunch of people at a protest.
There were some people from law enforcement there, trying to prevent a fight.
I liked reading the signs that people made for the protest.
I was impressed by the protesters creativity.
Although they had vibrant signs, the protesters marched in silence.
